resources.string: If you withdraw consent to the access and use of non-personal data from your device, Wallpaper Carousel services will be deactivated and any collected data will be deleted within the period specified in applicable laws and regulations.

AI button allows you to trigger Mi AI and use Mi AI shortcuts.
Double press AI button to complete custom tasks
Press and hold AI button to talk to Mi AI
Press AI button to view Mi AI shortcuts
You can use this app to manage, edit, and beautify photos and videos.
Package installer is used for installing third-party apps, including pre-installation scanning and post-installation app recommendation services.
Permissions manager is a basic service that allows you to manage app permissions on this device.
You can use this app to back up and restore items on your device.
Bluetooth is used by the system for wireless communication. To be able to work normally, Bluetooth needs the following permissions:
Initial setup allows you to set your basic preferences for this device. To set up your device successfully, Bluetooth system services will use the following permissions:
You can use this app for calculations, converting units and currencies, and estimating your mortgage repayments.
You can use this app to take photos and videos.
You can use Camera to take photos and shoot videos.

When you tap images and stories in Wallpaper Carousel, their full versions will be opened in your browser. Our trusted third party content provider can then recommend additional content and ads that are tailored to your interests. If you agree to activate this feature, they will place cookies in your browser, as described in this Cookie Policy. If you decline cookies, Wallpaper Carousel will still work but its content and recommendations might stop being relevant to you. You can always change your preferences in Settings.
Cookies allow us to personalize your Lock screen experience.
Read and agree to our trusted third party service provider's Privacy Policy and User Agreement before using Wallpaper Carousel.
Wallpaper Carousel will show you fresh stories every time you unlock your device

In order to improve the quality of services provided to you, the programs running on this device (including SystemHelper, RegService, and Carrier services) might send the information about this device or your SIM card (including IMEI, IMSI, MSISDN, MEID, ICCID, MAC address, system version, Android version, device model, basic hardware configuration, and phone number), as well as your approximate location (including region, coordinates, neighborhood identifier, and base station ID), to your carrier via WLAN, mobile networks, or SMS. Mobile carriers guarantee that this information will only be used for analysis, service quality improvements, or providing customized services or technologies and will never be shared with anyone in a way that might allow to identify you personally. Refer to the relevant statement from your carrier for details. You can inquire about all related service fees directly from your carrier.
<Data>By turning on this feature, you're agreeing to its <a href=%1$s>Privacy Policy</a >.</Data>
You can use this app to view time, as well as use timer, world clock, stopwatch, set alarms, and more.
You can choose turn off location access in Settings > Privacy protection > Manage or restrict permissions for individual apps in Security.

In order to improve the services provided to you, the mobile network operator of your choice may upload your personal data and the info about this device to its servers using WLAN networks or mobile data connection. This information will only be used for statistical purposes in order to improve the quality of the services and provide more personalized content. This information won't be used to identify you personally and won't be disclosed to third parties.
You can use this app for navigation, as well as viewing coordinates, atmospheric pressure, and altitude.
Swipe up to enter the system
Content Center aggregates content and services from multiple channels. Here you can read articles, watch videos, view daily featured items, and receive content recommendations.
Keep holding down two fingers to enable accessibility.

When you tap the images and stories in Wallpaper Carousel, we'll open their full versions in your browser. Taboola, our trusted third party content provider, can then recommend additional content and ads that are tailored to your interests. If you agree to activate this feature, Taboola will place cookies on your device via the browser, as described in Taboola's Cookie Policy. If you decline the use of cookies, Wallpaper Carousel items will continue to appear on your Lock screen and full stories will be opened in your browser, but additional recommendations won't be specifically selected for you. You can change your preferences anytime in the Settings.
Decide whether you'd like our trusted third party content providers to use cookies to personalize content recommendations and ads based on your interests.
If you aren't connected to WLAN now, your device will use mobile data. Using mobile data may generate additional carrier fees.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, verify Mi Pay transactions, or to sign in to apps and services.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, or to sign in to apps and services.
This service allows you to view device info, connect your device to networks, and set up its features.
Send diagnostic data to locate and analyze system issues and improve user experience. Such data may include personal information (e.g. IP, location, etc.)
If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this service.

If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this feature. You can choose not to use this feature in such cases.
If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this service.
If you don't agree to grant these permissions, you won't be able to use location services. You can turn location services on or off at any time in Settings > Privacy protection.
If you don't agree to grant these permissions, you won't be able to use Xiaomi Account services. You can turn Xiaomi Account services on or off at any time in Settings > Xiaomi Account.
If you don't agree to grant these permissions, you won't be able to use this app.
If you don't agree to grant these permissions, this service won't be able to work normally.
If you choose not to grant these permissions, the service won't be able to work normally.
If you don't want to grant these permissions, you won't be able to use Bluetooth. You can turn Bluetooth on and off and add Bluetooth devices in Settings > Bluetooth.
We will use the permissions only when you start transferring data from your device when its screen is damaged. If you don't agree to grant these permissions, you won't be able to use this app.

If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to uninstall, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases.

Downloads is an app provided by Xunlei used for downloads and managing downloaded content (including App store content, videos, system updates, themes, and browser content) for users of Xiaomi devices.

You turned on TalkBack by pressing the screen with %1$d fingers for more than %2$d seconds. TalkBack provides voice feedback for people with visual impairments. If you turned it on by accident, tap the Cancel button, and then double tap the screen.
Quick apps service framework is a basic service framework that supports quick apps distribution and operation.
Mi Link lets you quickly connect to Bluetooth devices.

Xiaomi service framework (Mi Push and Analytics) is a basic system service that provides push notifications, risk prevention, statistics, and analytics capabilities. In order to provide these services, we need to collect and process relevant and necessary personal information. When collecting and processing such information, we will comply with applicable laws, regulations, and other normative documents.

In order to provide push notification functionality, we need to collect device identifiers (OAID and encrypted Android ID), information about the apps that use the push service (e.g. app package name, version, and runtime status), device manufacturer, device model, device memory, operating system version, region, name of the SIM card carrier name, current network type, and the WLAN status. You can change the way you receive push notifications in Settings, and we'll provide you with push notifications based on your preferences, for which we'll also collect the information about your preferences including whether you choose to block notifications or not, and whether you allow them to appear on Lock screen. For the purposes of risk prevention, statistics, and analytical processing, we need permission to connect to the network and access your location, device IMEI, device IMSI, device identifiers (OAID, MAC address, and encrypted Android ID), device manufacturer, device model, device memory, operating system version, region, and current network type. The above information will be collected once a day for as long as you use this device.
Games plug-in allows you to sign in, create orders, complete payments, use coupons, and participate in promotion events.

To be able to work normally, Google Play needs to connect to the internet, access your location, be able to send SMS and MMS, record audio, make calls, access calendar events, call history, sensors, storage, camera, device info, and accounts.
No network connection. View the Privacy Policy for this keyboard at %s.
IMS service provides basic communication capabilities and is used for high-definition audio and video calls.
Choose the default keyboard that you'll use for writing messages, notes, and just about everything else. Note that you can install other third-party keyboards later.
Xiaomi Internet Communication Services lets you discover, connect, and communicate with other devices.

Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services allow your devices to interact with each other wirelessly. These services include Mi Smart Play, casting, app handoff, Home screen+, shared clipboard, cross-device image capture, network assistance, shared keyboards and mice, shared camera, and Mi Smart Hub.To be able to work normally, Xiaomi Interconnectivity Services need to connect to the internet and require the following permissions: Mi Smart Play and casting: Turn Bluetooth on or off For discovering nearby devices to connect to via Bluetooth Turn WLAN on or off For discovering nearby devices and transferring items via WLAN Transfer items to other devices For establishing a Bluetooth connection between devices and transferring items Access location info For accessing the info of nearby devices Record internal device audio For transferring and playing audio between devices while casting and mirroring Access photos, videos, and audio stored on the device For sending and receiving transferred content Access device MAC address For recognizing connected devices Access screen content For accessing screen content while recording or casting, including sensitive information such as audio, passwords, payment passwords, photos, messages, etc. App handoff and Home screen+: Turn Bluetooth on or off For discovering nearby devices via Bluetooth Turn WLAN on or off For discovering nearby devices and transferring items via WLAN Access device MAC address For recognizing connected devices Access photos, videos, and audio stored on the device For sending and receiving transferred content Transfer items to other devices For establishing a Bluetooth connection between devices and transferring items Record internal device audio For transferring and playing audio between devices while casting and mirroring Access screen content For accessing screen content while recording or casting, including sensitive information such as audio, passwords, payment passwords, photos, messages, etc. Shared clipboard and cross-device image capture: Turn Bluetooth on or off For discovering nearby devices via Bluetooth Turn WLAN on or off For discovering nearby devices and transferring items via WLAN Access photos, videos, and audio stored on the device For sending and receiving transferred content Access clipboard For allowing apps to access copied content Network assistance, shared keyboards and mice, and shared camera: Turn Bluetooth on or off For discovering nearby devices via Bluetooth Turn WLAN on or off For discovering nearby devices and transferring items via WLAN Access photos, videos, and audio stored on the device For sending and receiving transferred content Access camera For taking photos and recording video Mi Smart Hub: Turn Bluetooth on or off For discovering nearby devices via Bluetooth Turn WLAN on or off For discovering nearby devices and transferring items via WLAN Record internal device audio For transferring and playing audio between devices while casting and mirroring Access photos, videos, and audio stored on the device For sending and receiving transferred content If you don't agree to grant these permissions, you won't be able to use these services. Avavailable interconnectivity services may differ based on your system version and device model. Find more information at %s.
If your device goes missing, you won't be able to prevent other people from using it and accessing your data unless you set a screen lock. Skip anyway?
Sharing location information with emergency rescue agencies

In accordance with the law, mobile carriers can obtain the location information of mobile devices to comply with the requirements of emergency rescue agencies (fire departments and the police) which pursue security and emergency rescue purposes.
Location services provides a variety of location-based services based on your location information.
Location services use positioning for providing location-specific services. When location services are used by your device, QCC module will connect to the network to speed up the positioning process.
Emergency rescue agencies can obtain your current location upon request
Wallpaper Carousel allows you to get fresh images delivered to your Lock screen daily.
This service allows apps to access and save photos, videos, audio, and files.
You can use this app to send and receive SMS.
Xiaomi Account lets you register, sign in to, and manage system accounts.

You don't have an internet connection. View the User Agreement at %s.
This allows using mobile data and GPS connection based on the user's request. Syncing accounts and other items may require using mobile data depending on the smartphone specifications.
Unless you have a plan with unlimited data, using mobile data may generate additional carrier fees. Use mobile data anyway?
You can restrict mobile data connection in the Settings later
This app allows you to create, view, and edit notes.

When personalized ad recommendations are off, you'll still see the same quantity of ads as when the feature is on. The ads, however, will no longer be relevant as they won't be based on your personal preferences.

When personalized ad recommendations are off, you'll still see the same quantity of ads in system apps as when the feature is on. The ads from Xiaomi and third party platforms, however, will no longer be relevant as they won't be based on your personal preferences.
Personalize ads based on your interests

You can send your location info to the police using SMS or mobile data automatically while you're calling 110, 120, 119, or 122. Read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using this feature.
The system will select the best time to download and install updates. Your device will be rebooted automatically to apply changes.
Allow the system to select the best time to download and install updates. Your device will be rebooted automatically to apply changes.

Update system and third party partner apps via GetApps to be able to use their latest features. You can turn off automatic updates in GetApps > Settings > Auto updates.
Allow apps and websites to access your location info to provide location-based services
System Daemon is used to improve system stability and performance. To be able to work normally, this service needs permissions to access and save items to device storage.

Help improve your experience by automatically sending diagnostic, device, and app usage data to Xiaomi. This will help improve battery life, system and app stability, and more. The data you'll send will contain general information about your device and how you use it (e.g. battery level, system and app activity, and errors). The data will be used to improve Xiaomi devices. Turning off this feature doesn't affect your device's ability to send the information needed for essential services such as system updates and security. You can control this feature from Settings > Passwords & security > Privacy > Usage and diagnostics.
Help improve your experience by automatically sending diagnostic, device, and app usage data to Xiaomi. This will help improve battery life, system and app stability, and more.
Help us improve our products and services by sharing your usage stats with us.
System Daemon allows you to transfer data from your device when its screen is damaged.

For allowing your other compatible devices that you connect to this device to access call history. This will only happen when you proactively require using call history via another device. Call history and contacts shared by the system via Bluetooth will only be cached locally on your devices and shared with them with your permission.

Telephony is a basic service that allows your device to make calls, send and receive messages, and connect to the network.
(Including POCO Launcher Privacy Policy and User Agreement)

Wallpaper Carousel recommendations are powered by Taboola, our trusted third party content provider. To provide this content, Taboola needs to access and store non-personal data from your device, including your system language and browser type. You can learn how Taboola uses the collected data in Taboola's Privacy Policy and User Agreement. Read and agree to the terms and conditions provided in these documents before you continue. If you don't agree, Wallpaper Carousel services will be deactivated.
Privacy protection is the commitment behind the design of our products

We are committed to respecting and protecting your privacy. Prioritizing research and development in the field of information security, Xiaomi constantly works on improving the methods, practices, and technical solutions that safeguard your data. We also share our latest achievements with our partners in order to ensure your privacy across the board.
We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
View the <a href=%1$s>Privacy Policy</a > of your selected keyboard.

The SIM card activation service verifies the information of the currently inserted SIM card to make sure that system services can work normally. These services include Find device, Mi Message, creating Xiaomi Accounts using phone numbers, and syncing messages and call history.
Couldn't find SIM card. Make sure SIM card is properly installed and you have sufficient funds on your balance.
Allow connecting to mobile data networks? If you do, the SIM card you insert will be used to connect to mobile data networks.
To insert your SIM card, read the instructions that came with your device.
Insert a SIM card before you continue. Find device and sync-related functionality won't be fully available to you if you create an account without a SIM card. This device supports eSIM.
SIM card couldn't connect to the network
Your SIM card couldn't connect to a valid carrier network. Make sure you have sufficient funds on your balance and try to connect again.
